text: Mayflower MRT station (TE6) is a underground Mass Rapid Transit station on the Thomson-East Coast Line in Ang Mo Kio, Singapore. It is located around Kebun Baru Heights Estate, Kebun Baru Community Centre (CC) and near CHIJ St Nicholas Girls' School. ==History== This station was first announced on 29 August 2012. It will have the most number of exits along the Thomson-East Coast Line, with seven, making it the most accessible. ==References== Category:Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) stations
title: Mayflower MRT station
